articles.content:
• Donald Trump called on conservatives to fight for election changes.
  • He wants mail-in and early voting to be curtailed.
  • Trump lost the 2020 election by seven million votes.
articles.description: Former US president Donald Trump has laid out a variety of election proposals, such as limiting absentee voting and days when Americans can vote.
articles.title: Trump proposes new voting limits, rails against 'monster' voting rights bill in comeback speech - News24
